RootApplet - Class in online.jdk11
this applet serves three purposes (1) it launches an indepentant frame for the primary application (2) a acts as a sound manager for all sub-applications (3) it acts a a focus for "kill" messages for all sub-applications (4) optionally house/browse a directory of games (5) supplies initialization parameters via "get" and related methods (6) serve as a dispatcher for javascript via "set" message Init Keys: "reviewerdir" if present, the applet spawns a FileSelector as its body "language" if present, "languageStrings" is read as the language translator
